name: Wave'em Up!
description:
Wave'em Up! is a game developed by a group of people that joined together for the Godot Wild Jam.

The game is set in a dystopian world where some virus made people in the 80s' boring. But who was behind the drug and how can you stop it. Either way, it's time to Synthwave some people up again with a kick-ass OST and awesome prototype features.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Left Mouse Button: Shoot
Shift: Phase (Makes the player faster and unable to take damage, drains Energy)
Escape: Pause/Unpause + Pause Menu

Credits:
Music: Mancer
Programming: Spookto, MarsEvader, tomGER
Art: Spookto, NascentSpace
and thanks to Willowblade for providing his face and voice to us :)

Spookto's note: I kinda forgot to put the wildcards in the exports sorry, the wildcards are: Willowblade, 80's BABY!, TAKE A CHANCE ON ME.
